attributes.contentHtml:
FatGrizzly I'm not looking into just hosting companies to work with, but general sick of seeing the same thing over and over.

I've been meaning to post this for a long time, I just didn't want to while working for FalixNodes. I was trying to push FalixNodes in certain direction without effecting profits, but I am kinda too late for that for moving us to a different panel and such.

attributes.bio: Pretty nice developer, who doesn't scam people like an idiot would :)

attributes.title: I'm Sick of Hositng Companies and This Needs to be Taken Care of
